trans-unit.source: Replace a StorSimple EBOD controller | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Replace a StorSimple EBOD controller | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Explains how to remove and replace one or both EBOD controllers on a StorSimple 8600 device.
trans-unit.target: Explains how to remove and replace one or both EBOD controllers on a StorSimple 8600 device.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial explains how to replace a faulty EBOD controller module on your Microsoft Azure StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial explains how to replace a faulty EBOD controller module on your Microsoft Azure StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: To replace an EBOD controller module, you need to:
trans-unit.target: To replace an EBOD controller module, you need to:

trans-unit.source: Remove the faulty EBOD controller
trans-unit.target: Remove the faulty EBOD controller

trans-unit.source: Install a new EBOD controller
trans-unit.target: Install a new EBOD controller

trans-unit.source: Consider the following information before you begin:
trans-unit.target: Consider the following information before you begin:

trans-unit.source: Blank EBOD modules must be inserted into all unused slots.
trans-unit.target: Blank EBOD modules must be inserted into all unused slots.

trans-unit.source: The enclosure will not cool properly if a slot is left open.
trans-unit.target: The enclosure will not cool properly if a slot is left open.

trans-unit.source: The EBOD controller is hot-swappable and can be removed or replaced.
trans-unit.target: The EBOD controller is hot-swappable and can be removed or replaced.

trans-unit.source: Do not remove a failed module until you have a replacement.
trans-unit.target: Do not remove a failed module until you have a replacement.

trans-unit.source: When you initiate the replacement process, you must finish it within 10 minutes.
trans-unit.target: When you initiate the replacement process, you must finish it within 10 minutes.

trans-unit.source: Before removing and replacing an EBOD controller, review the safety information in <linkText>StorSimple hardware component replacement</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Before removing and replacing an EBOD controller, review the safety information in <linkText>StorSimple hardware component replacement</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Before replacing the failed EBOD controller module in your StorSimple device, make sure that the other EBOD controller module is active and running.
trans-unit.target: Before replacing the failed EBOD controller module in your StorSimple device, make sure that the other EBOD controller module is active and running.

trans-unit.source: The following procedure and table explain how to remove the EBOD controller module.
trans-unit.target: The following procedure and table explain how to remove the EBOD controller module.

trans-unit.source: Open the Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: Open the Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to Devices > Maintenance > Hardware Status, and verify that the status of the LED for the active EBOD controller module is green and the LED for the failed EBOD controller module is red.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to Devices > Maintenance > Hardware Status, and verify that the status of the LED for the active EBOD controller module is green and the LED for the failed EBOD controller module is red.

trans-unit.source: Locate the failed EBOD controller module at the back of the device.
trans-unit.target: Locate the failed EBOD controller module at the back of the device.

trans-unit.source: Remove the cables that connect the EBOD controller module to the controller before taking the EBOD module out of the system.
trans-unit.target: Remove the cables that connect the EBOD controller module to the controller before taking the EBOD module out of the system.

trans-unit.source: Make a note of the exact SAS port of the EBOD controller module that was connected to the controller.
trans-unit.target: Make a note of the exact SAS port of the EBOD controller module that was connected to the controller.

trans-unit.source: You will be required to restore the system to this configuration after you replace the EBOD module.
trans-unit.target: You will be required to restore the system to this configuration after you replace the EBOD module.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this will be Port A, which is labeled as Host in in in the following diagram.
trans-unit.target: Typically, this will be Port A, which is labeled as Host in in in the following diagram.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Backplane of EBOD controller</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Backplane of EBOD controller</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Figure 1 Back of EBOD module
trans-unit.target: Figure 1 Back of EBOD module

trans-unit.source: |Label|Description| |:----|:----------| |1|Fault LED| |2|Power LED| |3|SAS connectors| |4|SAS LEDs| |5|Serial ports for factory use only| |6|Port A (Host in)| |7|Port B (Host out)| |8|Port C (Factory use only)|
trans-unit.target: |Label|Description| |:----|:----------| |1|Fault LED| |2|Power LED| |3|SAS connectors| |4|SAS LEDs| |5|Serial ports for factory use only| |6|Port A (Host in)| |7|Port B (Host out)| |8|Port C (Factory use only)|

trans-unit.source: The following procedure and table explain how to install an EBOD controller module in your StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: The following procedure and table explain how to install an EBOD controller module in your StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: Check the EBOD device for damage, especially to the interface connector.
trans-unit.target: Check the EBOD device for damage, especially to the interface connector.

trans-unit.source: Do not install the new EBOD controller if any pins are bent.
trans-unit.target: Do not install the new EBOD controller if any pins are bent.

trans-unit.source: With the latches in the open position, slide the module into the enclosure until the latches engage.
trans-unit.target: With the latches in the open position, slide the module into the enclosure until the latches engage.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Installing EBOD controller</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Installing EBOD controller</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Figure 2 Installing the EBOD controller module
trans-unit.target: Figure 2 Installing the EBOD controller module

trans-unit.source: Close the latch.
trans-unit.target: Close the latch.

trans-unit.source: You should hear a click as the latch engages.
trans-unit.target: You should hear a click as the latch engages.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Releasing EBOD latch</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Releasing EBOD latch</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Figure 3 Closing the EBOD module latch
trans-unit.target: Figure 3 Closing the EBOD module latch

trans-unit.source: Reconnect the cables.
trans-unit.target: Reconnect the cables.

trans-unit.source: Use the exact configuration that was present before the replacement.
trans-unit.target: Use the exact configuration that was present before the replacement.

trans-unit.source: See the following diagram and table for details about how to connect the cables.
trans-unit.target: See the following diagram and table for details about how to connect the cables.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Cable your 4U device for power</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Cable your 4U device for power</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Figure 4  Reconnecting cables
trans-unit.target: Figure 4  Reconnecting cables

trans-unit.source: |Label|Description| |:----|:----------| |1|Primary enclosure| |2|PCM 0| |3|PCM 1| |4|Controller 0| |5|Controller 1| |6|EBOD controller 0| |7|EBOD controller 1| |8|EBOD enclosure| |9|PDUs|
trans-unit.target: |Label|Description| |:----|:----------| |1|Primary enclosure| |2|PCM 0| |3|PCM 1| |4|Controller 0| |5|Controller 1| |6|EBOD controller 0| |7|EBOD controller 1| |8|EBOD enclosure| |9|PDUs|

trans-unit.source: Learn more about <linkText>StorSimple hardware component replacement</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Learn more about <linkText>StorSimple hardware component replacement</linkText><title></title>.
